about_info.p1: Hello! I'm Marcelo Junior, a passionate professional in the field of development, 23 years old, and a graduate in Information Systems from Unibalsas in Balsas-MA.
about_info.p2: Currently, I am part of the front-end development team at Buzzvel, a company based in Portugal, specialized in the development of Web Systems, Websites, and Applications.
about_info.p3: I have a solid experience with various tools and technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Tailwind, ReactJs, Laravel, PHP, Wordpress, and GIT.
about_info.p4: I am dedicated, collaborative, and love working in teams. My professional journey is marked by a constant pursuit of learning, always aiming to improve and grow each day.
